channel.title: Getting the Deposit Box to work [PI]

item.title: Getting the Deposit Box to work [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Vhenom Vhenom
item.description:
@Vhenom wrote:

So I’m trying to make my deposit box work but all I can get it to do is bring up the interface upon clicking it. It shows the deposit options and everything but when I click deposit, deposit all, deposit 5, etc…nothing happens. Can someone help me out with this?

Here is my code so far in ActionHandler.java

case 9398://Deposit Box c.getPA().sendFrame126("The Bank of "+c.playerName+".", 7421); c.getPA().sendFrame248(4465, 197); c.getItems().resetItems(7423); break;

And there’s a picture of how it looks like the object I’m using ID is 9398

2i2056r.png762×334

Read full topic
item.source: Getting the Deposit Box to work [PI]
